英文品名: Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System GM101
效能: Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System is designed for in-vitro diagnostic use (For self-testing and professional-testing). It is for the checking on glucose levels in capillary whole blood (CB).
醫器規格: 1. Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System GM101：Rightest Blood Glucose Meter, Rightest Blood Glucose Test Strip x 50 pcs, Rightest Control Solution, Rightest Lancing Device, Rightest Lancet x 10 pcs. 2.Rightest Blood Glucose Test Strip GS101：50、75、100、200 pcs/Box
醫器主類別一: A臨床化學及臨床毒理學
